description:
An unofficial libre application to listen to public domain audiobooks. An unofficial libre application to listen to LibriVox audiobooks. Some features it brings are:
  • Finding books of different genres and languages
  • Searching audiobooks by title, author or language with archive.org's API
  • Downloading audiobooks to play offline
  • Remembering position in audiobook and resume when played again
  • Playing with the application in the background and with the screen turned off
  • User interface in multiple languages (translations welcome!)
The application has no ads and is also fully open source under the GPL3 license, so if anything is not to your liking, feel free to contribute!
